definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: q1 So let me just rewrite that as, I just want to divide by q1 everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 分子分母同时除以，现在我写的这些。

sentences.english: The second term in the last-written denominator can be dropped.
sentences.chinese: 上式中分母的第二项可以略去。

sentences.english: Until you go to low pressure, where now this term dominates the denominator.
sentences.chinese: 直到你在低压，这里这一项成为分母的主要部分。

sentences.english: The first step is to rationalize the denominator of a fraction.
sentences.chinese: 第一步是使分数的分母有理化。

sentences.english: You have to enter the numerator and the denominator.
sentences.chinese: 您需要输入结果的分子和分母。

sentences.english: The value of a fraction is inversely proportional to that of the denominator.
sentences.chinese: 分数值与分母值成反比例。

sentences.english: Remember, balance is a common denominator here.
sentences.chinese: 记住，在这里平衡是一种常见的分母。

sentences.english: You have to enter numerator and denominator.
sentences.chinese: 您需要输入结果的分子和分母。

sentences.english: The denominator is the smaller the value of the fraction.
sentences.chinese: 分母愈大则分数的值愈小。

sentences.english: The remainder from dividing the cksum value by the denom value.
sentences.chinese: 校验和值除以分母值的余数。

sentences.english: Reduced to the lowest common denominator.
This paper gives the general procedure of rationalizing denominators.
sentences.chinese: 给出了有理化分母的一般程序。

sentences.english: There are two limiting cases, which we can tell by looking at the denominator.
sentences.chinese: 有两个极限情况，我们可以通过看分母来判断。

sentences.english: That is a bad approach, because it inflates the denominator.
sentences.chinese: 那是不好的手段，因为无形中扩大了分母。

sentences.english: And now we'll do the bottom, the numerator.
sentences.chinese: 现在我们做黑板底部的，分母部分。

sentences.english: Population growth is the ever-expanding denominator that gives each person a shrinking share of the resource pie.
sentences.chinese: 人口增长加大了人均资源分配公式中的分母。

definition: improper fraction (with numerator ≥ denominator, e.g. seven fifths)/see also: proper fraction 真分數|真分数[zhen1 fen1 shu4] and mixed number 帶分數|带分数[dai4 fen1 shu4]
reduced fraction (e.g. one half for three sixths)/to reduce a fraction by canceling common factors in the numerator and denominator

mixed fraction/mixed number (i.e. with an integer part and a fraction part, e.g. four and three quarters)/see also: improper fraction 假分數|假分数[jia3 fen1 shu4] and proper fraction 真分數|真分数[zhen1 fen1 shu4]
proper fraction (with numerator < denominator, e.g. five sevenths)/see also: improper fraction 假分數|假分数[jia3 fen1 shu4] and mixed number 帶分數|带分数[dai4 fen1 shu4]
